sbp.client.drivers.network_drivers module¶

TCP and HTTP networking client components.

class sbp.client.drivers.network_drivers.HTTPDriver(device_uid=None, url='https://broker.staging.skylark.swiftnav.com', retries=(5, 3), timeout=(30, 120))[source]¶

Bases: sbp.client.drivers.base_driver.BaseDriver

The HTTPDriver class reads SBP messages from an HTTP service for a device and writes out to a stream. This driver is like a file-handle with read and writes over two separately HTTP connections, but can also be enabled and disabled by its consumer.

device_uid
: uid
Device unique id
url
: str
HTTP endpoint
retries
: tuple
Configure connect and read retry count. Defaults to (MAX_CONNECT_RETRIES, MAX_READ_RETRIES).
timeout
: tuple
Configure connect and read timeouts. Defaults to (DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT, DEFAULT_READ_TIMEOUT).
close()[source]¶

File-handle close wrapper (noop).

connect_read(device_uid=None, pragma=None)[source]¶

Initialize a streaming read/write HTTP response. Manually connects the underlying file-handle. In the event of a network disconnection, use to manually reinitiate an HTTP session.

connect_write(source, whitelist, device_uid=None, pragma=None)[source]¶

Initialize a streaming write HTTP response. Manually connects the underlying file-handle. In the event of a network disconnection, use to manually reinitiate an HTTP session.

source
: sbp.client.handler.Handler
Iterable source of SBP messages.
whitelist
: [int]
Whitelist of messages to write
flush()[source]¶

File-flush wrapper (noop).

read(size)[source]¶

Read wrapper. If the client connection is closed or some other exception is thrown, raises an IOError.

size
: int
Size to read (in bytes).

bytearray, or None

read_close()[source]¶

File-handle close wrapper (noop).

read_ok¶

Are we connected for reads?

write(data)[source]¶

Write wrapper (noop). Actual stream is initiated by the write connection.

data
: object
Data to write.
write_close()[source]¶

File-handle close wrapper (noop).

write_ok¶

Are we connected for writes?

exception sbp.client.drivers.network_drivers.HTTPException[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

class sbp.client.drivers.network_drivers.TCPDriver(host, port, timeout=5)[source]¶

Bases: sbp.client.drivers.base_driver.BaseDriver

The TCPDriver class reads SBP messages to and from a TCP socket.

port
: string
Path to port to read SBP messages from.
baud
: int
Baud rate of serial port.

Read wrapper.

size
: int
Number of bytes to read

s

Bytes to write
